bookText.htmlContent: In the land of Merra there are meny types of snapper all of which specialise in diffrent areas of the world. the most well known snappers are the following: The Mountain Snapper which is known as the biggest and most feral of all snappers. The Deep-Sea Snapper which unlike most snappers is solatery while hunting. The Desert Snapper which is known as the weakest kind of snapper on Merra. The Harpy Snapper which is known as the smallest but most aggressive kind of snapper. The Swamp Snapper which is a crocodilian in nature preferring to reside in swamps, rivers and tarns. The Cock Snapper which is known for its phallic tail and being able to naturally poses a "normal" penis.

Snappers are one of the more unique creatures of Merra mostly in the way they propagate, almost no snappers possess male genitalia (besides the rare Cock-Snapper) so how do they reproduce? Within every snappers breast, a set of testicles reside and their heads work as the exit point for the sperm. Snappers use their sperm as a projectile to transform potential mates or new additions to their group.

Snappers are know as one of the most savage beasts in the wilds of Merra with there tough skin and near endless stamina they can catch almost anything they desire.
